metadata.title: Pricing
metadata.description: Choose a plan that brings peace and comfort to your heart

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Create personalized Bible comfort videos that bring peace, warmth, and spiritual comfort to your heart. Choose the plan that fits your needs and start your journey of finding peace today.

items.title: Free Plan
items.description: Start your journey of finding peace and comfort. Perfect for trying out our service and experiencing the warmth of personalized Bible videos.
features: 3 credits granted to new users upon registration
items.tip: No credit card required. Start creating comfort videos today.

items.title: 20 Credits
items.description: Perfect for occasional use. Create meaningful Bible videos when you need comfort, peace, or want to express gratitude.
items.tip: One-time purchase. Credits never expire, use them whenever you need comfort.

items.title: 60 Credits
items.description: Most Popular - Best value for regular users. Create comfort videos regularly and share peace with loved ones.
items.label: Most Popular
features: Save 33% compared to buying 20 credits three times
Share videos with family and friends
items.tip: Best value! Save 33% and never worry about running out of credits.

messages.seo_tooltip_content: Our pricing is designed to provide value and peace of mind. We offer flexible credit-based plans that never expire, allowing you to create personalized Bible comfort videos whenever you need them. Our transparent pricing ensures you only pay for what you use, with no hidden fees or recurring subscriptions. Perfect for individuals and families seeking spiritual comfort and peace.
